description:
Nakazato Takeshi, also known as the Black Lightning, is the leader of the Myogi NightKids. He made his first appearance at the race in Akina where http://anidb.net/ch9257 [Takahashi Keisuke] of the RedSuns is to race against http://anidb.net/ch9199 [Takumi]. Surprised that Takumi could defeat Keisuke, Takeshi decides that he is going to be the one to challenge and defeat the "Akina downhill specialist", and that the RedSuns are next on his list.
He drives black Nissan Skyline GT-R V-Spec II (BNR32).
name: Nakazato Takeshi
